trans-unit.source: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the Triple Data Encryption Standard (3DES) algorithm.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng" /> class with an ephemeral key.
The name of the key.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng" /> class with the specified key name, which represents an existing persisted 3DES key.

This constructor uses a default <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions> value of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions.None> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A> as the default key storage provider (KSP) to open the key.
trans-unit.target: Ce constructeur utilise la valeur par défaut <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions> valeur <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions.None> et <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.MicrosoftSoftwareKeyStorageProvider%2A> en tant que le fournisseur de stockage de clés (KSP) par défaut pour ouvrir la clé.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keyName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
All other errors.
The name of the key.
The KSP that contains the key.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng" /> class with the specified key name, which represents an existing persisted 3DES key, and the specified key storage provider (KSP).
A default <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions> value of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions.None> is used to open the key.
trans-unit.target: Une valeur par défaut <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions> valeur <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyOpenOptions.None> est utilisé pour ouvrir la clé.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keyName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="provider" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
All other errors.
The name of the key.
The KSP that contains the key.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify options for opening the key, such as where the key is opened from (machine or user storage) and whether to suppress UI prompting.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng" /> class with the specified key name, which represents an existing persisted 3DES key, the specified key storage provider (KSP) and key open options.
<paramref name="keyName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="provider" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) is not supported on this system.
All other errors.
Creates a symmetric decryptor object.
Creates a symmetric 3DES decryptor object with the current key and initialization vector (<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV" />).
A symmetric 3DES decryptor object.
This method decrypts an encrypted message created using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateEncryptor> overload with the same signature.
trans-unit.target: Cette méthode déchiffre un message chiffré créé à l’aide de la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateEncryptor> avec la même signature de surcharge.

trans-unit.source: The secret key to use for the 3DES algorithm.
The key size must be 192 bits.
The initialization vector to use for the 3DES algorithm.
Creates a symmetric 3DES decryptor object with the specified key and initialization vector (IV).
A symmetric 3DES decryptor object.

This method decrypts an encrypted message created using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateEncryptor%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.Byte%5B%5D%29> overload with the same signature.
trans-unit.target: Cette méthode déchiffre un message chiffré créé à l’aide de la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateEncryptor%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.Byte%5B%5D%29> avec la même signature de surcharge.

trans-unit.source: If you've created the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng> object using an existing persisted key and you want to make use of that key when decrypting the message, you want to set the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV%2A> property and then call the parameterless <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateDecryptor> overload instead; otherwise, using this method will create an ephemeral key as specified by the `rgbKey` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Si vous avez créé le <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng> de l’objet à l’aide d’existant persistante clé et que vous souhaitez faire utiliser que clés lors du déchiffrement du message, vous souhaitez définir la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV%2A> propriété et appelez ensuite sans paramètre <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateDecryptor> de surcharge à la place ; sinon, l’utilisation de cette méthode crée une clé éphémère comme spécifié par le `rgbKey` paramètre.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rgbKey" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="rgbKey" /> is not a valid size for this algorithm.
-or-
<paramref name="rgbIV" /> size does not match the block size for this algorithm.
<paramref name="rgbKey" /> is a known weak key for this algorithm and cannot be used.
-or-
<paramref name="rgbIV" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Creates a 3DES symmetric encryptor object.
Creates a symmetric 3DES encryptor object using the current key and initialization vector (<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV" />).
A symmetric 3DES encryptor object.
Use this method to encrypt a message and then use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateDecryptor%2A> overload with the same signature to decrypt the result of this method.
trans-unit.target: Utilisez cette méthode pour chiffrer un message, puis utiliser le <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateDecryptor%2A> avec la même signature pour déchiffrer le résultat de cette méthode de surcharge.

trans-unit.source: The secret key to use for the 3DES algorithm.
The key size must be 192 bits.
The initialization vector to use for the 3DES algorithm.
Creates a symmetric 3DES encryptor object with the specified key and initialization vector (IV).
A symmetric 3DES encryptor object.
Use this method to encrypt a message and then use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateDecryptor%2A> overload with the same signature to decrypt the result of this method.
trans-unit.target: Utilisez cette méthode pour chiffrer un message, puis utiliser le <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateDecryptor%2A> avec la même signature pour déchiffrer le résultat de cette méthode de surcharge.

trans-unit.source: If you've created the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng> object using an existing persisted key and you want to make use of that key when encrypting the message, you want to set the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV%2A> property and then call the parameterless <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateEncryptor> overload instead; otherwise, using this method will create an ephemeral key as specified by the `rgbKey` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Si vous avez créé le <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng> de l’objet à l’aide d’existant persistante clé et que vous souhaitez faire utiliser que clés lors du chiffrement du message, vous souhaitez définir la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV%2A> propriété et appelez ensuite sans paramètre <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.CreateEncryptor> de surcharge à la place ; sinon, l’utilisation de cette méthode crée une clé éphémère comme spécifié par le `rgbKey` paramètre.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rgbKey" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="rgbKey" /> is not a valid size for this algorithm.
-or-
<paramref name="rgbIV" /> size does not match the block size for this algorithm.
<paramref name="rgbKey" /> is a known weak key for this algorithm and cannot be used.
-or-
<paramref name="rgbIV" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Generates a random initialization vector (IV) to use for the 3DES algorithm.
Generates a random key to use for the 3DES algorithm.
Gets or sets the key for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng" /> algorithm.
The key for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng" /> algorithm.

If you've created the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng> object using an existing persisted key, when you read the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.Key%2A> property, an attempt to export the key will be made.
trans-unit.target: Si vous avez créé le <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng> de l’objet à l’aide d’existant persistante clé, lors de la lecture de la valeur de la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.Key%2A> propriété, une tentative d’exporter la clé sera effectuée.

trans-unit.source: In this case, if the key is not exportable, a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Dans ce cas, si la clé n’est pas exportable, un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> sera levée.

trans-unit.source: In addition to that, if you set the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.Key%2A> property, the persisted key will no longer be used and a temporary key will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: En plus de cela, si vous définissez la valeur de la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.Key%2A> propriété, la clé persistante est ne plus être utilisée et une clé temporaire sera utilisée à la place.

trans-unit.source: If you need to use the persisted key again, a new instance of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng> class needs to be created.
trans-unit.target: Si vous devez utiliser la clé rendue persistante, une nouvelle instance de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng> classe doit être créée.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the secret key used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng" /> algorithm.
The size, in bits, of the secret key used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: La taille en bits de la clé secrète utilisée par l’algorithme <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng" />.

trans-unit.source: If you've created the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng> object using an existing persisted key and you set the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.KeySize%2A> property, the persisted key will no longer be used and a temporary key will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: Si vous avez créé le <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng> de l’objet à l’aide d’existant persistante clé et que vous définissez la valeur de la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng.KeySize%2A> propriété, la clé persistante est ne plus être utilisée et une clé temporaire sera utilisée à la place.

trans-unit.source: If you need to use the persisted key again, a new instance of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng> class needs to be created.
trans-unit.target: Si vous devez utiliser la clé rendue persistante, une nouvelle instance de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCng> classe doit être créée.
